item.title: 30 Days of Godot Tutorials
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: These tutorials are brought to you for free as part of the Kickstarter project Make Professional 2d Games with Godot. It was funded in 12h, and plenty of stretch goals were unlocked already. Please check it out! This is an Open Source project. Both the assets and the code are available on Github, with comments to help you learn directly from the examples.

item.title: Intro To Monster Design For 2d Games
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: The intro to monster design is the first free training released on GDquest. In about 40 minutes, it will run you through the thought process a game artist might follow to design monsters. It both covers the thought process behind the design of a monster and an example of monster drawing with pen, paper and Krita. Useful links Free Krita tutorial for Game Artists

item.title: Intro to the Godot game engine
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: Welcome to the first free tutorial series on GDquest that’s dedicated to Godot! Over the course of 1h, it’ll teach you some basic concepts with the engine.
